column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Each night after we finish eating our dinner , I go upstairs to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=The first thing that I do is get myself a clean towel and wash cloth .
#id=3
#text=I put these items on the side of the bath tub in my bathroom .
#id=4
#text=I then put the stopper in the drain of the bathtub and turn on the water faucet .
#id=5
#text=I wait for the water to warm up and check it with my hand to make sure it is warm and not too hot .
#id=6
#text=Once the bath tub is half way full , I turn off the water .
#id=7
#text=Then I take off my clothes and climb into the bath tub .
#id=8
#text=I get my wash cloth and put it under the water .
#id=9
#text=I then get the soap and rub it on my wet wash cloth to make suds .
#text=The next thing to do is take the wash cloth and wash my entire body , starting with my face and ending with my toes .
#text=After I have washed everything , I rinse the soap from my body with the water in the tub .
#text=Finally , I get out of the tub , take the stopper out of the drain to let the water out , and use my towel to dry off .
